We like Frank’s. Serve it with this classic skillet cornbread—and see more Super Bowl recipes here.IngredientsMakes about ¾ cup½cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, cut into pieces, room temperature3tablespoons honey1tablespoon hot sauceGenerous pinch of kosher saltPreparationStep 1Vigorously whisk butter, honey, hot sauce, and salt in a medium bowl until smooth.Step 2Do Ahead: Butter can be made 8 hours ahead.
